language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Fruit, seed; soft inner part of clam
bear much fruit or many flowers
(1-3), Lit. "egg of tree". ref. to (117) egg and (207) tree
Fruit, nut, seed, bulbil, berry, egg (Ebt)
水果 (not 树 'tree', which is su213)
Must be possessed: e.g. 'ai fuan'='tree fruit'
Preceded by type of fruit, or 'ai fuan' (lit. 'plant fruit) if unidentified or generic
